subdisciplines.name: Musicology
subdisciplines.description: The study of music in historical context, including its creation, performance, reception, and cultural significance.

subdisciplines.name: Ethnomusicology
subdisciplines.description: The study of music within its cultural context, including its social and cultural significance, performance practices, and musical traditions.

subdisciplines.name: Music Theory
subdisciplines.description: The study of the mechanics of music, including its structure, harmony, rhythm, and form.

subdisciplines.name: Music Technology
subdisciplines.description: The study of the tools and techniques used to create, record, and produce music, including recording equipment, software, and musical instruments.
